title: Segment Customers for a Marketing Campaign
description: A marketer wants to create a customer segment of 'high-value' customers for an exclusive offer.

tasks.description: Define the criteria for a 'high-value' customer (e.g., lifetime spend > $1000 and at least 3 orders in the last year).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets the filtering parameters.

tasks.description: Query the customer database to generate a list of all customers who meet these criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the customer segment.

tasks.description: Save the generated list as a new audience segment named 'VIP Customers'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent saves the segment for future use.
